replies.body:
RADS errors are generally a good indication there may be a problem with League not running with the right system permissions. Because League interacts with a lot of files in and outside of the Riot Games folder, it can be stopped by Windows if it doesn't have permission to reach certain folders, files, or software packages. Check out our [permissions guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) for the most common solutions to resolve this.

Let me know if you still encounter issues after taking the steps in that guide.
